html.p: This dashboard and these panels extract device information for a specific location for all users.

search.query: eventtype=cisco-ise Location="$location$" NAS_Port_Type="*" | stats count by EndPointMatchedProfile | rename EndPointMatchedProfile AS "Endpoint Matched Profile"
eventtype=cisco-ise Location="$location$" NAS_Port_Type="*" | stats count by EndPointMatchedProfile | sort -count | `format_field_names`

chart.title: Operational View by Device for Wired Users

search.query: eventtype=cisco-ise Location="$location$" NAS_Port_Type="Ethernet" | stats count by EndPointMatchedProfile | rename EndPointMatchedProfile AS "Endpoint Matched Profile"

eventtype=cisco-ise Location="$location$" NAS_Port_Type="Ethernet" | fillnull value="NULL" Framed_IP_Address | stats count by EndPointMatchedProfile UserName EndPointMACAddress Framed_IP_Address | sort -count | `format_field_names`

chart.title: Operational View by Device for Wireless Users

search.query: eventtype=cisco-ise Location="$location$" NAS_Port_Type="Wireless - IEEE 802.11" | stats count by EndPointMatchedProfile | rename EndPointMatchedProfile AS "Endpoint Matched Profile"

eventtype=cisco-ise Location="$location$" NAS_Port_Type="Wireless - IEEE 802.11" | fillnull value="NULL" Called_Station_ID | stats count by EndPointMatchedProfile UserName EndPointMACAddress Calling_Station_ID Called_Station_ID | sort -count | `format_field_names`
